text: In England a priest was able in the past, by patronage, to hold several preferments at one time."ABCD: a basic church dictionary" Meakin, T: Norwich, Canterbury Press, 2001 The actual work was allocated to a curate at a minimal salary."History of the Church of England" Wakeman, H.O. (1927 revision- Ollard, S.I) pp36-40: London, Rivingtons, 1896) Authors such as Anthony Trollope highlighted the injustice of this practice and it is no longer permissible. ==Notes== Category:Anglican ecclesiastical offices
title: Living (Christianity)
